Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 51st overall pick, by California in 1970...
Injured on 7/18/1970 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/12/1972 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 6/25/1975 with a Fractured Hand, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 4/8/1976 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/29/1978, off Nelson Briles (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/21/1978, off Ross Grimsley Jr. (TEX)...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 3/2/1985 to a minor league deal...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1985...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/10/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $830,000 per year...
Released by Minnesota on 9/1/1986...
Drafted in 2nd round, 40th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1987...
Injured on 5/1/1989 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/3/1992 with a Strained Back, out for 2-3 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: LF M. Lawton, P J. Valera. Going to PHI: P B. Wilkinson)...
Injured on 4/19/1993 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1993 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 6/8/1995...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 7/14/1997 (Going to LA: P W. Roberts. Going to DET: P J. Valera, 3B B. Smith)...
Struck out 15 batters against Baltimore on 8/10/1997...
Injured on 6/16/1998 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1998 Allstar game...
